en.apresentacao:
I am a senior back-end developer with solid experience in PHP, Laravel, Linux, and PostgreSQL, working in IT since 2009 and programming since 2013. I have a track record in high-performance, scalable, and secure projects, acting both in development and in system architecture and infrastructure.

Since 2019, I have also been a private programming tutor at Superprof Brazil, where I maintain one of the best national ratings, teaching from programming fundamentals to advanced practices such as automated testing, DevOps, and software architecture. My focus is to combine technical knowledge and clear communication to deliver solid and sustainable results.
competencias: AWS (EC2, RDS, SNS, S3, EKS, Lambda)

descricao: Development of internal tools and SaaS solutions for clients.
Programming classes and training.
Scalable projects with PHP, Laravel, Filament, Livewire, Vue.js, and AWS.
Development and refactoring of core systems.
API creation with PHP/Laravel and infrastructure improvements.
Development of APIs and PHP/Laravel applications.
AWS integrations and performance optimization.
Responsible for the external partners portal and sales integrations.
Implementation of critical business features and commission calculations.
Programming classes from basic to advanced.
Personalized content for PHP, Laravel, Docker, Linux, and DevOps.
